page.title: 17FARMER'S DAY,CAUNTON
page.content:
{THE FARMER'S DAY}
The study group asked a number of farmers to describe a typical day on the farm.This one was chosen at random.{Monday 8th July 1985.} 07.30 Breakfast. 08.00 Bring cows out of field.Suckle calves.Return cows.Bucket feed calves on milk powder then hay and water. 10.15 Break for coffee. 10.30 Cut hay. 12.00 Lunch. 13.00 Cut hay. 14.30 Fix sheeting over new shed. 17.00 Tea. 17.30 Bring cows out of field.Suckle calves.Return cows.Bucket feed calves on milk powder then hay and water. 18.30 Shepherd cows in the field. 20.00 End of working day.
